pages.text: $(li)The Milk Bucket is a drink, when consumed, it will immediately removes all you status effects.$(br)$(li)It can be crafted with Milk Bottles and an Empty Bucket too.

$(li)You can obtain Milk Bucket without crafting too.$(br)$(li)You have to right click while you are holding an Empty Bucket on your hand and you are pointing a Cow, Yaks or Mooshroom.$(br)$(li)This is a valious ingredient to multiple food recipes in a Crafting Table.
